org.elasticsearch.action.support.replication

Class TransportWriteAction<Request extends ReplicatedWriteRequest<Request>,Response extends ReplicationResponse & WriteResponse>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.action.support.TransportAction<Request,Response>
        • org.elasticsearch.action.support.replication.TransportReplicationAction<Request,Request,Response>
          • org.elasticsearch.action.support.replication.TransportWriteAction<Request,Response>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TransportDeleteAction, TransportIndexAction, TransportShardBulkAction

    public abstract class TransportWriteAction<Request extends ReplicatedWriteRequest<Request>,Response extends ReplicationResponse & WriteResponse>
extends TransportReplicationAction<Request,Request,Response>
    Base class for transport actions that modify data in some shard like index, delete, and shardBulk.
